text: There were ten plagues in Egypt at the time of the Exodus: They were: # Water turned into blood # Frogs # Lice # Flies or Wild beasts # Diseased livestock # Painful Boils # Thunderstorm of hail and fire # Locusts # Darkness for three days # Death of firstborn sons These plagues meant that the Egyptians had to pay for the suffering of the Jews, by suffering themselves. Category:Old Testament
title: Plagues of Egypt
